tests.original_sentence: The project, developed by the team of engineers who won the national competition, impressed the judges.

tests.original_sentence: The book, written by the author who was inspired by her childhood experiences, became a bestseller.

tests.original_sentence: The flowers, nurtured by the gardener with great care, bloomed beautifully.
The cake, baked by the chef who had years of experience, was the highlight of the party.
The computer program, designed by a team of experts who had worked on similar projects, solved the problem efficiently.
The concert, organized by the committee who had been planning for months, attracted a large audience.
The painting, created by the artist who had studied the old masters, sold for a high price.
The software, developed by the programmer who had previously worked on similar applications, increased productivity significantly.
The presentation, delivered by the speaker who was an expert in the field, captivated the audience.
The bridge, designed by the renowned architect who had a unique vision, became a popular landmark.
The statue, carved by the sculptor who had studied under a famous mentor, drew crowds of tourists.
The speech, given by the politician who had a reputation for honesty, convinced many undecided voters.
The article, written by the journalist who had uncovered several scandals, revealed new information about the case.
The experiment, conducted by the scientist who had a history of groundbreaking research, yielded surprising results.
The play, directed by the award-winning director who had worked with famous actors, received rave reviews.
